Kemendikbud Ajak 22 PT Susun Soal Tes CPNS, Ada Isu Radikalisme
06 Nov 2019, 08:22 by Antara, Yudono Yanuar
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Kementerian Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan melibatkan 22 perguruan tinggi untuk menyusun soal ujian seleksi calon pegawai negeri sipil (CPNS) 2019.
"Kami dari Kemendikbud, sebagai panitia seleksi nasional (panselnas) ditugaskan membuat soal, dan kami melibatkan 22 PT karena soal tersebut juga mempertimbangkan kewilayahan," kata Sekjen Kemendikbud Didik Suhardi, di Jakarta, Rabu, 6 November 2019.
Soal yang dibuat, kata dia, memuat tes tentang wawasan kebangsaan, intelegensi umum dan karakteristik pribadi.
"Terkait rumpun keilmuan soal, perlu dilakukan koordinasi, karena itu kami akan segera mengundang beberapa perguruan tinggi untuk menyepakati rumpun keilmuan," katanya.
Penyelarasan rumpun keilmuan, menurut dia, bertujuan membantu panitia di berbagai tingkatan agar tidak melakukan interpretasi sesuai pendapat masing-masing terhadap soal tes.
Mengenai upaya menangkal pelamar berpaham radikal lolos menjadi ASN, tim penyusun soal juga telah memasukkan uji tersebut dalam tes wawasan kebangsaan.
"Untuk memperkuat menangani radikalisasi, perlu juga nantinya di latihan dasar CPNS," demikian Didik Suhardi.

Kemendikbud Invites 22 PT to Arrange CPNS Test Problems, There Is a Radicalism Issue
06 Nov 2019, 08:22 by Antara, Yudono Yanuar
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The Ministry of Education and Culture involves 22 universities to compile 2019 civil service candidate selection exam questions.
"We from the Ministry of Education and Culture, as the national selection committee (panselnas) are tasked with making questions, and we involve 22 universities because the questions also consider territoriality," said Secretary General of the Ministry of Education and Culture Didik Suhardi, in Jakarta, Wednesday, November 6, 2019.
The questions made, he said, contained tests about national insights, general intelligence and personal characteristics.
"Regarding the scientific group, it is necessary to coordinate, therefore we will soon invite several universities to agree on the scientific group," he said.
The alignment of scientific knowledge, according to him, aims to help committees at various levels so as not to interpret according to their respective opinions on test questions.
Regarding efforts to ward off radical ideology applicants qualifying as ASN, the question drafting team has also included the test in the national insight test.
"To strengthen dealing with radicalization, it is also necessary later on in CPNS basic training," said Didik Suhardi.
